summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Usage Analyzer MVP. All backend APIs (9/9) and frontend functionality working perfectly. Core features including PII detection, cost calculation, real-time event display, analytics, and filtering are fully operational.
passed_tests: Single AI usage event creation with PII detection
Event retrieval with filtering (provider, model, user, service)
Cost calculation based on token usage
Error handling for invalid data (422 validation)
Live Feed page with real-time events
Analytics page with charts and insights
Filter panel functionality across all pages
PII detection and redaction in prompts
Navigation between all three main pages
action_item_for_E1: No action items required. The AI Usage Analyzer MVP is fully functional and ready for production deployment. All core features are working as expected.
